TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content:
Wait whos doing today's??!??!?! Lol 

![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
Selfish\_Meme did today's. Its already posted.

Well im up for next weeks SCF. Count me in if you guys dont have any other urgent volunteers. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I will let MRS decide that.
I'm happy to do a week at some point too
I added a poll for who should do next week's. DO NOT VOTE FOR THE EXTRA OPTIONS, THEY'RE THERE FOR IF SOMEONE ELSE SHOWS UP!!!!! It should expire on Thursday.

I would like to do one, however I can't tell how much time I'll have next week. I may be free for all of Friday itself, but if this week is anything like the last,I'll be completely booked from Monday through Thursday.

This means I am out of space on the poll, sorry, but I cannot add any more people to the poll.

I would just delete the poll and post a new one. That way people who previously voted on the incomplete poll can vote for somebody else (me) and the people who think they're funny and decided to vote for an empty spot can actually do something with their lives and place a serious vote (for me).

>

The Mod Gods have spoken and changed the poll ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Yay! Fairness and less defiance! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Will there be a brand new vote for next week's maintainer, or will the person with the second highest votes get next week, or will you pick somebody at random?

I vote random! Actually, I don't vote at all. Mainly because I think they would all do a good job.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

 If it was up to me, in fact, I would do this as a list, fist come first served, and if someone can't do it the week they are supposed to, the next person jumps in and they go to the bottom of the rooster. 

Rune. Voting and such can lead to analysis paralysis...
Spacecraft Fridays should be flexible, but I think we should add a set of defined rules that we must follow, maybe on the top would be do not feature your own crafts.
